document.full_text: major league baseball (mlb) has launched an investigation after atlanta braves pitching coach roger mcdowell was accused of "highly inappropriate conduct toward fans" by a man on wednesday.
document.title: mlb to investigate "inappropriate" conduct by coach
lines_and_colors: major league baseball (mlb) has launched an investigation after atlanta braves pitching coach roger mcdowell was accused of "highly inappropriate conduct toward fans" by a man on wednesday.
